alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tulsa County through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Tulsa. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Catoosa... Tulsa International Airport... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 227 and 232. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
